name: Do You Miss The Sky?
description:
You're alone, in the boiler room, with only a telegraph machine for communication.

You must not let the boiler run cold.

They're all counting on you.

...Are any of them even real?

------

Made over the course of 72 hours for Mini Jam 56, by Ampderg.

Editing and Playtesting by Aripegio.

If you encounter any bugs, please report them to Ampderg#0001 on Discord
